Title: Condemned
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Joe Pokaski, Marco Ramirez, Luke Kalteux (story editor), Christos N. Gage (staff writer), Ruth Fletcher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Toby Leonard Moore
Plot: Daredevil finds himself trapped in the fallout of Fisk's plan to take control of Hell's Kitchen. Ben Urich digs closer to the truth.
